perjalanan-aman: Safe and Comfortable Transfer in Bali
armada-kendaraan-modern: A fleet of modern vehicles and experienced drivers are ready to take you wherever you want.
jelajahi-keajaiban: Explore the Wonders of the Island of the Gods
dari-pantai-hingga-gunung: From beaches to mountains, we are ready to bring you an authentic Balinese experience.
pesan-di-hitravel: Book at Hi Transfer Bali in 3 easy steps

list-1.title: Find
list-1.desk: Look for a pick-up car or tour package that suits your needs, there are many choices for you.

list-2.title: Pay
list-2.desk: Make payments using various payment methods that are safe, fast and easy.

list-3.title: Finished
list-3.desk: You're ready for the holidays! Transaction information will be sent to your email.

sudah-siap-menjelajahi-bali: Are you ready to explore the wonders of Bali?
enjoy-a-holiday: Enjoy a holiday experience in Bali with exciting activities and easy access to purchasing transport with Hi Transfer Bali
mobil-tidak-ditemukan: Sorry, we couldn't find an available car on your desired schedule. <br class='hidden md:block' /> Try selecting a different date.
paket-tur-tidak-ditemukan: Sorry, we couldn't find any tour packages available on your desired schedule. <br class='hidden md:block' /> Try choosing a different date.
apakah-sudah-punya-akun: Do you already have an account?
jika-tidak-menerima-email: If you did not receive an email
otp-expired: Your OTP has expired. Please request a new one
kami-akan-mengirimkan: We will send a code to your email
selamat-datang-di-dashboard: Welcome to the Admin Dashboard at Transfer Bali, please use a registered account to log in
peserta-tur-dari-dewasa: Tour participants from age 11 years and over.
yang-harus-kamu-bayar: The amount you have to pay

validasi-password: Password should be at least 7 characters
validasi-max-password: Password should be at most 50 characters

validasi-confirm-max-password: Confirm Password should be at most 50 characters
otp-minimum: OTP should be at least 6 characters
otp-maksimum: OTP should be at most 6 characters
silakan-periksa-kotak-masuk: Silakan periksa kotak masuk email Anda untuk mendapatkan verifikasi PIN untuk proses pengembalian dana, lalu ketik di kolom di bawah ini.

payment_success_page.title: Payment Success
payment_success_page.description: Your payment was successful. Thank you for your order.

payment_failed_page.title: Payment Failed
payment_failed_page.description: Your payment was failed. if you think this is an error, please contact us

lokasi-harus-dibali: The location must be in Bali. Please select another location

pastikan-lokasi: Make sure the location you choose is right
lokasi-tidak-boleh-sama: Lokasi should not be the same
the-distance-cannot: the distance cannot be smaller than 1 km
success-please-check-your-email-step: Success please check your email for more step
